creator: miha@softhome.net
text:
we have many tasks that executed from ant. These tasks are not extended from 
ant classes, but regular java code.

This will be nice idea, if ant could check exit code of executed java class and
instead of always printing "BUILD SUCCSESFUL" - print the exit message 
depending of java exit code: for example, if java class exit code == -1, ant 
should print SUCC, if 0 - FAILER!
